participant_1.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a constant source of comfort and love.
i am bipolar.
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
I've had my cards read a couple of times.
I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just relaxing at home. What about you?
Same here, just got off work and hanging out. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to race go karts! It's so much fun to get pumped up and race with the wind in your hair.
That sounds exciting! I've always wanted to try that.
You should! It's a lot of fun. I also like to listen to upbeat music to get me pumped up.
I can relate to that. I love upbeat music. It puts me in a good mood.
Me too! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I really like pop and R&B.
I like those genres too! I also like country music.
That's cool! I haven't listened to much country music, but I've heard some good songs.
You should check out some more country music. There are a lot of great songs out there.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
